mapper.select: SELECT a.id, a.user_id, a.cover, a.title, a.content, a.people_number, a.time_start, a.time_end, a.`status`, u.avatar, u.nickname From a_activity a LEFT JOIN u_user u on u.id = a.user_id WHERE a.id = #{activityId}

SELECT a.id, a.cover, a.user_id, a.title, a.time_start, a.time_end, u.avatar, u.nickname FROM a_activity a LEFT JOIN u_user u ON u.id = a.user_id WHERE a.`status` = 1 ORDER BY a.create_time DESC, a.time_start, a.time_end

select a.id, a.cover, a.title, a.content, a.people_number, a.time_start, a.time_end, a.user_id, u.avatar, u.nickname from (SELECT id, user_id, cover, title, content, people_number, time_start, time_end FROM a_activity WHERE `status` = 1 AND id = #{activityId}) a LEFT JOIN u_user u ON a.user_id = u.id
SELECT id, cover as img, title FROM a_activity WHERE `status` = 1 AND id < #{activityId} ORDER BY id DESC LIMIT 1
SELECT id, cover as img, title FROM a_activity WHERE `status` = 1 AND id > #{activityId} ORDER BY id LIMIT 1
SELECT id FROM a_activity WHERE status != 5 AND sysdate() >= time_start;
